      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                if current_user&.is_a?(User)
          
      21.

              def safety_standards
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                # Always provide calculation metadata for the view
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                @calculation_metadata = SafetyStandard.calculation_metadata
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

            
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                if request.post? && params[:calculation].present?
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                  calculate_safety_standard
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                    format.turbo_stream
          
      19.

      21.

              def calculate_safety_standard
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                case params[:calculation][:type]
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                when "anchors"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                  calculate_anchors
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                when "user_capacity"
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  calculate_user_capacity
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                when "slide_runout"
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                  calculate_slide_runout
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                when "wall_height"
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                  calculate_wall_height
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                end
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

              end
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

            
          
      51.

              def calculate_anchors
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                area = params[:calculation][:area].to_f
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                if area > 0
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  @anchor_result = {
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                    area: area,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                    required_anchors: SafetyStandard.calculate_required_anchors(area),
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                    formula_breakdown: "((#{area}  114)  1600)  1.5 = #{SafetyStandard.calculate_required_anchors(area)}"
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  @anchor_error = t("safety_standards_reference.errors.invalid_area")
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              def calculate_user_capacity
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

                length = params[:calculation][:length].to_f
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                width = params[:calculation][:width].to_f
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                negative_adjustment = params[:calculation][:negative_adjustment].to_f
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

            
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                if length > 0 && width > 0
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                  @capacity_result = {
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                    length: length,
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                    width: width,
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                    area: length * width,
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                    negative_adjustment: negative_adjustment,
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                    usable_area: (length * width) - negative_adjustment,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                    capacities: SafetyStandard.calculate_user_capacity(length, width, negative_adjustment)
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  }
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                else
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  @capacity_error = t("safety_standards_reference.errors.invalid_dimensions")
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                end
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

              end
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

              def calculate_slide_runout
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                platform_height = params[:calculation][:platform_height].to_f
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                if platform_height > 0
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  required_runout = SafetyStandard.calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  @runout_result = {
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                    platform_height: platform_height,
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                    required_runout: required_runout,
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

                    calculation: "50% of #{platform_height}m = #{platform_height * 0.5}m, minimum 0.3m = #{required_runout}m"
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                  }
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                else
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

                  @runout_error = t("safety_standards_reference.errors.invalid_platform_height")
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                end
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

              end
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

            
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              def calculate_wall_height
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                user_height = params[:calculation][:user_height].to_f
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

            
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                if user_height > 0
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                  @wall_height_result = {
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                    user_height: user_height,
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                    requirement: wall_height_requirement_text(user_height),
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                    requires_roof: SafetyStandard.requires_permanent_roof?(user_height)
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  }
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                else
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                  @wall_height_error = t("safety_standards_reference.errors.invalid_user_height")
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                end
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

              end
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

            
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

              def wall_height_requirement_text(user_height)
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                thresholds = SafetyStandard::SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                case user_height
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                when 0..thresholds[:no_walls_required]
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                  "No containing walls required"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                when thresholds[:no_walls_required]..thresholds[:basic_walls]
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                  "Walls must be at least #{user_height}m (equal to user height)"
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                when thresholds[:basic_walls]..thresholds[:enhanced_walls]
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                  "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * 1.25).round(2)}m (1.25 user height)"
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                when thresholds[:enhanced_walls]..thresholds[:max_safe_height]
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                  "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * 1.25).round(2)}m + permanent roof required"
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                else
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                  "Exceeds safe height limits (>#{thresholds[:max_safe_height]}m)"
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                end
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

              end
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

            
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

              def build_json_response
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                case params[:calculation][:type]
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                when "anchors"
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                  if @anchor_result
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                    {success: true, result: @anchor_result}
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                  else
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                    {success: false, error: @anchor_error}
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                  end
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                when "user_capacity"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                  if @capacity_result
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                    {success: true, result: @capacity_result}
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                  else
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

                    {success: false, error: @capacity_error}
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                  end
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                when "slide_runout"
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  if @runout_result
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

                    {success: true, result: @runout_result}
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  else
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

                    {success: false, error: @runout_error}
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  end
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                when "wall_height"
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

                  if @wall_height_result
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                    {success: true, result: @wall_height_result}
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  else
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

                    {success: false, error: @wall_height_error}
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  end
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                else
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

                  {success: false, error: "Invalid calculation type"}
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                end
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

              end
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

            end
          
      159.

              def update
          
      164.

                params = inspection_params

    167. 
            

            

                if params[:unit_id].present?
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

                  unit = current_user.units.find_by(id: params[:unit_id])
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

            
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  if unit.nil?
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                    # Unit ID not found or doesn't belong to user - security issue
          
      172.

                    flash[:danger] = "Invalid unit selection"
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173.

      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                  end
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                end
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

            
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                if @inspection.update(params)
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                  respond_to do |format|
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                    format.html do
          
      180.

      182.

                    format.turbo_stream do
          
      185.

              def inspection_params
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                # Get the base params with permitted top-level attributes
          
      269.

      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  :inspection_date, :inspection_location, :passed, :comments, :unit_id,
          
      271.

                  :inspector_company_id, :unique_report_number, :status, :has_slide,
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                  # Dimension comment fields
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

                  :width_comment, :length_comment, :height_comment,
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                  :num_low_anchors_comment, :num_high_anchors_comment,
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  :exit_number_comment, :rope_size_comment,
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  :slide_platform_height_comment, :slide_wall_height_comment, :runout_value_comment,
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

                  :slide_first_metre_height_comment, :slide_beyond_first_metre_height_comment,
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  :slide_permanent_roof_comment,
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  :containing_wall_height_comment, :platform_height_comment,
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  :permanent_roof_comment, :play_area_length_comment, :play_area_width_comment,
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

                  :negative_adjustment_comment
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                )
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

            
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

                # For each assessment, permit all attributes except timestamps and inspection_id
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                assessment_types = %w[
          
      286.

                  user_height_assessment

                  enclosed_assessment

    295. 
            

            

                assessment_types.each do |assessment_type|
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                  next unless params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"].present?
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                  # Permit all fields except the ones we want to block
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  assessment_params = params[:inspection]["#{assessment_type}_attributes"]
          
      300.

                  cleaned_params = assessment_params.permit!.except("created_at", "updated_at", "inspection_id")
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            
          
      302.

      303.

      304.

                base_params

              def set_inspection

              def check_inspection_owner
          
      329. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    329. 
            

            

                unless @inspection.user_id == current_user.id

              def inspections_to_csv
          
      336. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    336. 
            

            

                attributes = %w[id name serial inspection_date reinspection_date inspector location passed comments manufacturer]
          
      337. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    337. 
            

            

            
          
      338. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    338. 
            

            

                CSV.generate(headers: true) do |csv|
          
      339. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    339. 
            

            

                  csv << attributes
          
      340. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    340. 
            

            

            
          
      341. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    341. 
            

            

                  current_user.inspections.order(created_at: :desc).each do |inspection|
          
      342. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    342. 
            

            

                    row = attributes.map { |attr| inspection.send(attr) }
          
      343. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    343. 
            

            

                    csv << row
          
      344. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    344. 
            

            

                  end
          
      345. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    345. 
            

            

                end
          
      346. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    346. 
            

            

              end
          
      347. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    347. 
            

            

            
          
      348. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    348. 
            

            

              def check_inspection_complete
          
      349. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    349. 
            

            

                unless @inspection.status == "completed" || @inspection.status == "finalized"
          
      350. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    350. 
            

            

                  render file: "#{Rails.root}/public/404.html", status: :not_found, layout: false
          
      351. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    351. 
            

            

                end
          
      352. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    352. 
            

            

              end
          
      353. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    353. 
            

            

            
          
      354. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    354. 
            

            

              def check_inspection_finalized
          
      355. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    355. 
            

            

                if @inspection.status == "finalized" && !current_user.admin?
          
      356. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    356.

      357. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    357. 
            

            

                  redirect_to inspection_path(@inspection)
          
      358. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    358. 
            

            

                end
          
      359. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    359. 
            

            

              end
          
      360. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    360. 
            

            

            
          
      361. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    361. 
            

            

              def check_inspection_finalized_for_delete
          
      362. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    362. 
            

            

                if @inspection.status == "finalized" && !current_user.admin?
          
      363.

    364. 
            

            

                  redirect_to inspection_path(@inspection)
          
      365. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    365. 
            

            

                end
          
      366. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    366. 
            

            

              end
          
      367. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    367. 
            

            

            end

    68 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 68 lines missed.

            class InspectorCompaniesController < ApplicationController

              before_action :require_login

    4. 
            

            

              before_action :require_admin, except: [:show]
          
      5.

              skip_before_action :require_login, only: [:new, :create, :destroy]

              def new

              def create
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                email = params.dig(:session, :email)
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                password = params.dig(:session, :password)
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

            
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                if email.present?
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                  user = User.find_by(email: email.downcase)
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

                  if user&.authenticate(password)
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

                    log_in user
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

                    if params[:session][:remember_me] == "1"
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            

            

                      cookies.permanent.signed[:user_id] = user.id
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

                    else
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                      cookies.delete(:user_id)
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                    end
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                    flash[:success] = "Logged in"
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            

            

                    redirect_to root_path
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                    return
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

                  end
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                end
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

            
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

                flash.now[:danger] = "Invalid email/password combination"
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            

            

                render :new, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

              end
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

            
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30.

              def create_from_inspection
          
      132.

                @inspection = current_user.inspections.find_by(id: params[:id])

      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

            
          
      144.

                @unit = current_user.units.build(unit_params)

                @unit.copy_dimensions_from(@inspection)

    147.

      150.

      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                else
          
      152.

      153.

                end

              def unit_params
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                params.require(:unit).permit(:name, :serial, :manufacturer, :photo,
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                  :description, :has_slide, :owner,
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                  :width, :length, :height, :model, :manufacture_date, :notes,
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  # Basic dimension comments
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                  :width_comment, :length_comment, :height_comment,
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  # Totally enclosed flag
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                  :is_totally_enclosed,
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  # Anchorage dimensions
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167.

      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                  # Enclosed dimensions
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  :exit_number, :exit_number_comment,
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  # Materials dimensions
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                  :rope_size, :rope_size_comment,
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  # Slide dimensions
          
      174.

      177.

      179.

              def set_unit

              def process_photo_if_present

              def unit_to_csv
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                attributes = %w[id name manufacturer serial has_slide]
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

            
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                CSV.generate(headers: true) do |csv|
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                  csv << attributes
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

            
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                  current_user.units.order(created_at: :desc).each do |unit|
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    row = attributes.map { |attr| unit.send(attr) }
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    csv << row
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                  end
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                end
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

              end
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

            end
          
      237.

              def create

              def update_password

    60. 
            

            

                if @user.authenticate(params[:user][:current_password])

                  if @user.update(password_params)

                    flash[:success] = "Password updated"

    63. 
            

            

                    redirect_to root_path
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                  else

    65. 
            

            

                    render :change_password, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

                  end
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                else
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                  @user.errors.add(:current_password, "is incorrect")
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

                  render :change_password, status: :unprocessable_entity
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                end
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end

              def impersonate
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                log_in @user
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                flash[:success] = "You are now impersonating #{@user.email}"
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                redirect_to root_path
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78.

              TIME_FORMATS = {
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

                "date" => "%b %d, %Y",
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

                "time" => "%b %d, %Y - %H:%M"
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              }

              def render_time(datetime)

                return nil if datetime.nil?

    9.

    10.

              # Shared form field helper logic - requires explicit i18n_base
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              1
            

            

              def form_field_setup(field, local_assigns, i18n_base: nil)
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                # Get form object - either passed directly or from wrapper
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                form_object = local_assigns[:form] || @_current_form
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

                # Require explicit i18n_base - no more guessing
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                i18n_base = local_assigns[:i18n_base] || i18n_base
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                raise ArgumentError, "i18n_base is required for form field setup" if i18n_base.nil?
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

            
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                # Simple label key construction
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                label_key = "#{i18n_base}.#{field}"
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

            
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                # Get label, hint, placeholder - fail loudly if required keys are missing
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                field_label = local_assigns[:label] || t(label_key, raise: true)
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

            
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

                # Build hint and placeholder keys with proper structure
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                base_parts = i18n_base.split(".")
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

                hint_key = (base_parts[0..-2] + ["hints", field.to_s]).join(".")
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                placeholder_key = (base_parts[0..-2] + ["placeholders", field.to_s]).join(".")
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

            
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                field_hint = local_assigns[:hint] || t(hint_key, default: nil)
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                field_placeholder = local_assigns[:placeholder] || t(placeholder_key, default: nil)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

            
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                {
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  form_object: form_object,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  i18n_base: i18n_base,
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                  field_label: field_label,
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                  field_hint: field_hint,
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  field_placeholder: field_placeholder
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                }
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

              end
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

            end

              def format_inspection_count(user)

              def assessment_completion_percentage(inspection)
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                # Check if inspection has any assessments
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                has_assessments = inspection.user_height_assessment.present? ||
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                  inspection.structure_assessment.present? ||
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                  inspection.anchorage_assessment.present? ||
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

                  inspection.materials_assessment.present? ||
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                  inspection.fan_assessment.present?
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

            
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # Also check conditional assessments
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                if inspection.has_slide?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

                  has_assessments ||= inspection.slide_assessment.present?
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                end
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                if inspection.is_totally_enclosed?
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                  has_assessments ||= inspection.enclosed_assessment.present?
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                end
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

            
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

                return 0 unless has_assessments
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            

            

                total_assessments = inspection_tabs(inspection).count - 1 # Exclude 'general' tab
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                return 0 if total_assessments == 0
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

            
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

                completed_assessments = 0
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            

            

                completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.user_height_assessment&.complete?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.structure_assessment&.complete?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

                completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.anchorage_assessment&.complete?
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.materials_assessment&.complete?
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.fan_assessment&.complete?
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

            
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                # Only count slide assessment if inspection has a slide
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                if inspection.has_slide?
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                  completed_assessments += 1 if inspection.slide_assessment&.complete?
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                end
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106.

            class StorageCleanupJob < ApplicationJob
          
      2.

              queue_as :default

    3. 
            

            

            
          
      4.

              # Class variable to track last execution and next scheduled time

              cattr_accessor :last_run_at, :next_run_at

    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7.

              def perform

    8. 
            

            

                # Find unattached blobs older than 2 days and schedule them for deletion
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

                count = ActiveStorage::Blob.unattached
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                  .where("active_storage_blobs.created_at <= ?", 2.days.ago)

    11. 
            

            

                  .count

      13.

    14.

      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16.

      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            

            

            
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                # Process in batches to avoid memory issues
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

                ActiveStorage::Blob.unattached
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

                  .where("active_storage_blobs.created_at <= ?", 2.days.ago)

                def generate_random_id(scope_conditions = {})

    11. 
            
              106

      12.

              106

    13. 
            
              106

                def with_similar_dimensions(reference, tolerance: 0.1)

    195. 
            

            

                  return none unless reference.respond_to?(:width) && reference.width.present?
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                  width_range = (reference.width * (1 - tolerance))..(reference.width * (1 + tolerance))
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                  length_range = (reference.length * (1 - tolerance))..(reference.length * (1 + tolerance))
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                  height_range = (reference.height * (1 - tolerance))..(reference.height * (1 + tolerance))
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                  where(width: width_range, length: length_range, height: height_range)
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202.

      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203.

                def dimension_statistics

                  {
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207.

      208.

              def safety_issues_summary

              private

              def safety_checks_assessed?

      51.

              def specifications_present?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                blower_serial.present? && fan_size_comment.present?

            end

              def pass_fail_summary
          
      121.

              def all_assessments_complete?

                return false unless has_assessments?

              def has_assessments?

              def auto_determine_pass_fail

              def all_safety_checks_pass?

                return true unless has_assessments?

                # Business logic to determine overall pass/fail

    205. 
            

            

                  structure_assessment&.respond_to?(:has_critical_failures?) && structure_assessment.has_critical_failures?,

    208.

    209.

                !critical_failures && meet_safety_thresholds?

      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                height_ok = !user_height_assessment&.respond_to?(:meets_height_requirements?) || user_height_assessment&.meets_height_requirements?
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217.

                return 0 unless has_assessments?

            # RPII Utility - Materials Assessment model

            class MaterialsAssessment < ApplicationRecord
          
      3.

              belongs_to :inspection

      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Material specifications
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :rope_size, numericality: {greater_than_or_equal_to: 0}, allow_blank: true
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

            
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

              # Pass/fail assessments for all materials
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            
              1
            

            

              MATERIAL_CHECKS = %w[rope_size_pass clamber_pass retention_netting_pass
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

                zips_pass windows_pass artwork_pass thread_pass
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            

            

                fabric_pass fire_retardant_pass].freeze
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # Critical material checks
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            
              1
            

            

              CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS = %w[fabric_pass fire_retardant_pass thread_pass].freeze
          
      15. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    15. 
            

            

            
          
      16. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    16. 
            
              1
            

            

              MATERIAL_CHECKS.each do |check|
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              9
            

            

                validates check.to_sym, inclusion: {in: [true, false]}, allow_nil: true
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

              end
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

              # Callbacks
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              1
            

            

              after_update :log_assessment_update, if: :saved_changes?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

            
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            
              1
            

            

              def complete?
          
      24. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    24. 
            

            

                material_assessments_complete? && rope_specifications_present?
          
      25. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    25. 
            

            

              end
          
      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26. 
            

            

            
          
      27. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    27. 
            
              1
            

            

              def has_critical_failures?
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                # Fire retardant, fabric strength, and thread are critical for safety
          
      29. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    29. 
            

            

                CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS.any? { |check| send(check) == false }
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

              end
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            

            

            
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            
              1
            

            

              def safety_check_count
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

                MATERIAL_CHECKS.length
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

              end
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            

            

            
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            
              1
            

            

              def passed_checks_count
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                MATERIAL_CHECKS.count { |check| send(check) == true }
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

              end
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

            
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            
              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                total_fields = MATERIAL_CHECKS.length + 1 # Include rope_size
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                completed_fields = (MATERIAL_CHECKS.map { |check| send(check) } + [rope_size]).count(&:present?)
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

            
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                (completed_fields.to_f / total_fields * 100).round(0)
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

              end
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

            
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            
              1
            

            

              def material_compliance_summary
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

                {
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            

            

                  critical_passed: CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS.count { |check| send(check) == true },
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                  critical_total: CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS.length,
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                  overall_passed: passed_checks_count,
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  overall_total: safety_check_count,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  rope_compliant: rope_size_compliant?
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                }
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

              end
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            

              def critical_material_status
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                failed_critical = CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS.select { |check| send(check) == false }
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

            
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                if failed_critical.empty?
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                  "All critical materials compliant"
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                else
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

                  "Critical failures: #{failed_critical.map(&:humanize).join(", ")}"
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            
              1
            

            

              def material_test_requirements
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                requirements = []
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                requirements << "Fabric tensile strength: 1850N minimum" if fabric_pass != true
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                requirements << "Fabric tear strength: 350N minimum" if fabric_pass != true
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

                requirements << "Fire retardancy: EN 71-3 compliance" if fire_retardant_pass != true
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                requirements << "Thread tensile strength: 88N minimum" if thread_pass != true
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                requirements << "Rope diameter: 18-45mm range" unless rope_size_compliant?
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                requirements
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

              end
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

            
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            
              1
            

            

              def non_critical_issues
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

                non_critical_checks = MATERIAL_CHECKS - CRITICAL_MATERIAL_CHECKS
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            

            

                failed_checks = non_critical_checks.select { |check| send(check) == false }
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

            
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                failed_checks.map(&:humanize)
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

              end
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

            
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

            
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            
              1
            

            

              def material_assessments_complete?
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                MATERIAL_CHECKS.all? { |check| !send(check).nil? }
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            

              def rope_specifications_present?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                rope_size.present?
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            

              def rope_size_compliant?
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                SafetyStandard.valid_rope_diameter?(rope_size)
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

              end
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

            
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_assessment_update
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                inspection.log_audit_action("assessment_updated", inspection.user, "Materials Assessment updated")
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            end

                def calculation_metadata

                  {

                    anchors: {

                      title: "Anchor Requirements",

                      description: "Anchors must be calculated based on the play area to ensure adequate ground restraint for wind loads.",
