                      method_name: :calculate_required_anchors,
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

                      example_input: 25.0,
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

                      input_unit: "m",
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            

            

                      output_unit: "anchors",
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                      formula_text: "((Area  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:area_coefficient]})  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:base_divisor]})  #{ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:safety_factor]} safety factor",
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                      standard_reference: "EN 14960:2019"
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

                    },
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

                    user_capacity: {
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            

            

                      title: "User Capacity Calculations",
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                      description: "Based on age-appropriate space allocation per user by height category.",
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                      method_name: :calculate_user_capacity,
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

                      example_input: [5.0, 4.0, 2.0],
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                      input_unit: ["length (m)", "width (m)", "negative adjustment (m)"],
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                      output_unit: "users per category",
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

                      formula_text: "Usable area  space requirement per age group",
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

                      standard_reference: "EN 14960:2019"
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            

            

                    },
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                    slide_runout: {
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

                      title: "Slide Runout Requirements",
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

                      description: "Minimum runout distance for safe slide deceleration.",
          
      121. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    121. 
            

            

                      method_name: :calculate_required_runout,
          
      122. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    122. 
            

            

                      example_input: 2.5,
          
      123. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    123. 
            

            

                      input_unit: "m",
          
      124. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    124. 
            

            

                      output_unit: "m",
          
      125. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    125. 
            

            

                      formula_text: "#{(RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:platform_height_ratio] * 100).to_i}% of platform height, minimum #{(RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:minimum_runout_meters] * 1000).to_i}mm",
          
      126. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    126. 
            

            

                      standard_reference: "EN 14960:2019"
          
      127. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    127. 
            

            

                    },
          
      128. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    128. 
            

            

                    wall_height: {
          
      129. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    129. 
            

            

                      title: "Wall Height Requirements",
          
      130. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    130. 
            

            

                      description: "Containing wall heights must scale with user height.",
          
      131. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    131. 
            

            

                      method_name: :meets_height_requirements?,
          
      132. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    132. 
            

            

                      example_input: 1.2,
          
      133. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    133. 
            

            

                      input_unit: "m",
          
      134. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    134. 
            

            

                      output_unit: "requirement text",
          
      135. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    135. 
            

            

                      formula_text: "Tiered requirements based on user height thresholds",
          
      136. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    136. 
            

            

                      standard_reference: "EN 14960:2019"
          
      137. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    137. 
            

            

                    }
          
      138. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    138. 
            

            

                  }
          
      139. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    139. 
            

            

                end
          
      140. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    140. 
            

            

            
          
      141. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    141. 
            

            

                def get_method_source(method_name)
          
      142. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    142. 
            

            

                  method_obj = method(method_name)
          
      143. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    143. 
            

            

                  source_location = method_obj.source_location
          
      144. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    144. 
            

            

            
          
      145. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    145. 
            

            

                  return "Source code not available" unless source_location
          
      146. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    146. 
            

            

            
          
      147. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    147. 
            

            

                  file_path, line_number = source_location
          
      148. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    148. 
            

            

                  return "Source file not found" unless File.exist?(file_path)
          
      149. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    149. 
            

            

            
          
      150. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    150. 
            

            

                  lines = File.readlines(file_path)
          
      151. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    151. 
            

            

                  method_lines = extract_method_lines(lines, line_number - 1, method_name)
          
      152. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    152. 
            

            

            
          
      153. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    153. 
            

            

                  # Add related constants for complete transparency
          
      154. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    154. 
            

            

                  related_constants = get_related_constants(method_name)
          
      155. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    155. 
            

            

            
          
      156. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    156. 
            

            

                  if related_constants.any?
          
      157. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    157. 
            

            

                    constants_section = "\n# Related Constants:\n"
          
      158. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    158. 
            

            

                    related_constants.each do |constant_name|
          
      159. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    159. 
            

            

                      constants_section += extract_constant_definition(lines, constant_name)
          
      160. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    160. 
            

            

                    end
          
      161. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    161. 
            

            

                    constants_section + "\n# Method Implementation:\n" + method_lines.join("")
          
      162. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    162. 
            

            

                  else
          
      163. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    163. 
            

            

                    method_lines.join("")
          
      164. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    164. 
            

            

                  end
          
      165. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    165. 
            

            

                rescue => e
          
      166. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    166. 
            

            

                  "Error retrieving source: #{e.message}"
          
      167. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    167. 
            

            

                end
          
      168. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    168. 
            

            

            
          
      169. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    169. 
            

            

                def get_related_constants(method_name)
          
      170. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    170. 
            

            

                  case method_name
          
      171. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    171. 
            

            

                  when :calculate_required_anchors
          
      172. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    172. 
            

            

                    ["ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS"]
          
      173. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    173. 
            

            

                  when :calculate_user_capacity
          
      174. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    174. 
            

            

                    ["USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS"]
          
      175. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    175. 
            

            

                  when :calculate_required_runout
          
      176. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    176. 
            

            

                    ["RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS"]
          
      177. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    177. 
            

            

                  when :meets_height_requirements?
          
      178. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    178. 
            

            

                    ["SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS", "WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS"]
          
      179. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    179. 
            

            

                  else
          
      180. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    180. 
            

            

                    []
          
      181. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    181. 
            

            

                  end
          
      182. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    182. 
            

            

                end
          
      183. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    183. 
            

            

            
          
      184. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    184. 
            

            

                def extract_constant_definition(lines, constant_name)
          
      185. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    185. 
            

            

                  constant_lines = []
          
      186. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    186. 
            

            

                  in_constant = false
          
      187. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    187. 
            

            

                  brace_count = 0
          
      188. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    188. 
            

            

            
          
      189. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    189. 
            

            

                  lines.each_with_index do |line, index|
          
      190. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    190. 
            

            

                    if line.strip.start_with?("#{constant_name} =")
          
      191. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    191. 
            

            

                      in_constant = true
          
      192. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    192. 
            

            

                      constant_lines << "#{index + 1}: #{line}"
          
      193. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    193. 
            

            

                      brace_count += line.count("{") - line.count("}")
          
      194. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    194. 
            

            

                      next
          
      195. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    195. 
            

            

                    end
          
      196. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    196. 
            

            

            
          
      197. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    197. 
            

            

                    if in_constant
          
      198. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    198. 
            

            

                      constant_lines << "#{index + 1}: #{line}"
          
      199. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    199. 
            

            

                      brace_count += line.count("{") - line.count("}")
          
      200. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    200. 
            

            

            
          
      201. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    201. 
            

            

                      # Check if we've closed all braces and reached the end
          
      202. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    202. 
            

            

                      if brace_count <= 0 && (line.strip.end_with?(".freeze") || line.strip == "}")
          
      203. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    203. 
            

            

                        break
          
      204. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    204. 
            

            

                      end
          
      205. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    205. 
            

            

                    end
          
      206. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    206. 
            

            

                  end
          
      207. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    207. 
            

            

            
          
      208. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    208. 
            

            

                  constant_lines.join("")
          
      209. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    209. 
            

            

                end
          
      210. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    210. 
            

            

            
          
      211. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    211. 
            

            

                def generate_example(calculation_type)
          
      212. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    212. 
            

            

                  metadata = calculation_metadata[calculation_type]
          
      213. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    213. 
            

            

                  return "No metadata available" unless metadata
          
      214. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    214. 
            

            

            
          
      215. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    215. 
            

            

                  case calculation_type
          
      216. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    216. 
            

            

                  when :anchors
          
      217. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    217. 
            

            

                    area = metadata[:example_input]
          
      218. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    218. 
            

            

                    result = calculate_required_anchors(area)
          
      219. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    219. 
            

            

                    "For #{area}#{metadata[:input_unit]} area: #{result} #{metadata[:output_unit]} required"
          
      220. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    220. 
            

            

                  when :user_capacity
          
      221. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    221. 
            

            

                    length, width, negative_adj = metadata[:example_input]
          
      222. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    222. 
            

            

                    result = calculate_user_capacity(length, width, negative_adj)
          
      223. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    223. 
            

            

                    usable_area = (length * width) - negative_adj
          
      224. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    224. 
            

            

                    "For #{length}m  #{width}m (#{usable_area}m usable): #{result[:users_1200mm]} children (1.2m category)"
          
      225. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    225. 
            

            

                  when :slide_runout
          
      226. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    226. 
            

            

                    platform_height = metadata[:example_input]
          
      227. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    227. 
            

            

                    result = calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      228. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    228. 
            

            

                    "For #{platform_height}#{metadata[:input_unit]} platform: #{result}#{metadata[:output_unit]} runout required"
          
      229. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    229. 
            

            

                  when :wall_height
          
      230. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    230. 
            

            

                    user_height = metadata[:example_input]
          
      231. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    231. 
            

            

                    case user_height
          
      232. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    232. 
            

            

                    when 0..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]
          
      233. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    233. 
            

            

                      requirement = "No containing walls required"
          
      234. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    234. 
            

            

                    when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]
          
      235. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    235. 
            

            

                      requirement = "Walls must be at least #{user_height}m (equal to user height)"
          
      236. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    236. 
            

            

                    when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]
          
      237. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    237. 
            

            

                      multiplier = WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS[:enhanced_height_multiplier]
          
      238. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    238. 
            

            

                      requirement = "Walls must be at least #{(user_height * multiplier).round(2)}m (#{multiplier} user height)"
          
      239. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    239. 
            

            

                    end
          
      240. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    240. 
            

            

                    "For #{user_height}#{metadata[:input_unit]} user height: #{requirement}"
          
      241. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    241. 
            

            

                  else
          
      242. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    242. 
            

            

                    "Example not available for #{calculation_type}"
          
      243. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    243. 
            

            

                  end
          
      244. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    244. 
            

            

                end
          
      245. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    245. 
            

            

            
          
      246. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    246. 
            

            

                def meets_height_requirements?(user_height, containing_wall_height)
          
      247. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    247. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Containing wall heights must scale with user height using WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS
          
      248. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    248. 
            

            

                  return false if user_height.nil? || containing_wall_height.nil?
          
      249. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    249. 
            

            

            
          
      250. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    250. 
            

            

                  enhanced_multiplier = WALL_HEIGHT_CONSTANTS[:enhanced_height_multiplier]
          
      251. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    251. 
            

            

            
          
      252. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    252. 
            

            

                  case user_height
          
      253. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    253. 
            

            

                  when 0..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]
          
      254. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    254. 
            

            

                    true # No containing walls required
          
      255. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    255. 
            

            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:no_walls_required]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]
          
      256. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    256. 
            

            

                    containing_wall_height >= user_height
          
      257. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    257. 
            

            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:basic_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]
          
      258. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    258. 
            

            

                    containing_wall_height >= (user_height * enhanced_multiplier)
          
      259. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    259. 
            

            

                  when SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]..SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:max_safe_height]
          
      260. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    260. 
            

            

                    containing_wall_height >= (user_height * enhanced_multiplier) # Plus permanent roof required
          
      261. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    261. 
            

            

                  else
          
      262. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    262. 
            

            

                    false # Exceeds safe height limits
          
      263. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    263. 
            

            

                  end
          
      264. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    264. 
            

            

                end
          
      265. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    265. 
            

            

            
          
      266. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    266. 
            

            

                def meets_runout_requirements?(runout_length, platform_height)
          
      267. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    267. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Slide runout length must be minimum 50% of platform height or 300mm, whichever is greater, to ensure safe deceleration
          
      268. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    268. 
            

            

                  return false if runout_length.nil? || platform_height.nil?
          
      269. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    269. 
            

            

            
          
      270. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    270. 
            

            

                  required_runout = calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      271. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    271. 
            

            

                  runout_length >= required_runout
          
      272. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    272. 
            

            

                end
          
      273. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    273. 
            

            

            
          
      274. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    274. 
            

            

                def calculate_required_runout(platform_height)
          
      275. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    275. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Minimum runout distance calculation using RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS for safe landing
          
      276. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    276. 
            

            

                  return 0 if platform_height.nil? || platform_height <= 0
          
      277. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    277. 
            

            

            
          
      278. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    278. 
            

            

                  # Calculate using constants from RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS
          
      279. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    279. 
            

            

                  height_ratio = RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:platform_height_ratio]
          
      280. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    280. 
            

            

                  minimum_runout = RUNOUT_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:minimum_runout_meters]
          
      281. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    281. 
            

            

            
          
      282. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    282. 
            

            

                  [platform_height * height_ratio, minimum_runout].max
          
      283. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    283. 
            

            

                end
          
      284. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    284. 
            

            

            
          
      285. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    285. 
            

            

                def calculate_required_anchors(area_m2)
          
      286. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    286. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Anchor point calculation: ((Area  area_coefficient)  base_divisor)  safety_factor, ensuring adequate ground restraint for wind loads
          
      287. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    287. 
            

            

                  # Formula from original Windows app: ((Area  area_coefficient)  base_divisor)  safety_factor, rounded up
          
      288. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    288. 
            

            

                  return 0 if area_m2.nil? || area_m2 <= 0
          
      289. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    289. 
            

            

            
          
      290. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    290. 
            

            

                  # Formula using constants from ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS
          
      291. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    291. 
            

            

                  area_coeff = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:area_coefficient]
          
      292. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    292. 
            

            

                  base_div = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:base_divisor]
          
      293. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    293. 
            

            

                  safety_mult = ANCHOR_CALCULATION_CONSTANTS[:safety_factor]
          
      294. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    294. 
            

            

            
          
      295. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    295. 
            

            

                  ((area_m2.to_f**2 * area_coeff) / base_div * safety_mult).ceil
          
      296. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    296. 
            

            

                end
          
      297. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    297. 
            

            

            
          
      298. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    298. 
            

            

                def calculate_user_capacity(length, width, negative_adjustment = 0)
          
      299. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    299. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - User capacity based on age-appropriate space allocation using USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS constants
          
      300. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    300. 
            

            

                  return {} if length.nil? || width.nil?
          
      301. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    301. 
            

            

            
          
      302. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    302. 
            

            

                  usable_area = (length * width) - (negative_adjustment || 0)
          
      303. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    303. 
            

            

                  return {} if usable_area <= 0
          
      304. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    304. 
            

            

            
          
      305. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    305. 
            

            

                  # Standard capacity calculation using constants from USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS
          
      306. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    306. 
            

            

                  {
          
      307. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    307. 
            

            

                    users_1000mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:young_children_1000mm]).floor,
          
      308. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    308. 
            

            

                    users_1200mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:children_1200mm]).floor,
          
      309. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    309. 
            

            

                    users_1500mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:adolescents_1500mm]).floor,
          
      310. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    310. 
            

            

                    users_1800mm: (usable_area / USER_SPACE_REQUIREMENTS[:adults_1800mm]).floor
          
      311. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    311. 
            

            

                  }
          
      312. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    312. 
            

            

                end
          
      313. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    313. 
            

            

            
          
      314.

                def valid_stitch_length?(length_mm)
          
      410. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    410. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Stitch length must be within specified range to ensure adequate seam strength while maintaining fabric integrity
          
      411. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    411. 
            

            

                  min_length = MATERIAL_STANDARDS[:thread][:stitch_length_min]
          
      412. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    412. 
            

            

                  max_length = MATERIAL_STANDARDS[:thread][:stitch_length_max]
          
      413. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    413. 
            

            

                  length_mm.present? && length_mm.between?(min_length, max_length)
          
      414. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    414. 
            

            

                end
          
      415. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    415. 
            

            

            
          
      416. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    416. 
            

            

                def valid_pressure?(pressure_kpa)
          
      417. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    417. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Minimum operational pressure required to maintain structural integrity and prevent collapse
          
      418. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    418. 
            

            

                  min_pressure = EQUIPMENT_SAFETY_LIMITS[:min_pressure]
          
      419. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    419. 
            

            

                  pressure_kpa.present? && pressure_kpa >= min_pressure
          
      420. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    420. 
            

            

                end
          
      421. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    421. 
            

            

            
          
      422. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    422. 
            

            

                def valid_fall_height?(height_m)
          
      423. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    423. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Maximum fall height to minimize injury risk from accidental falls outside the structure
          
      424. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    424. 
            

            

                  max_height = EQUIPMENT_SAFETY_LIMITS[:max_fall_height]
          
      425. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    425. 
            

            

                  height_m.present? && height_m <= max_height
          
      426. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    426. 
            

            

                end
          
      427. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    427. 
            

            

            
          
      428. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    428. 
            

            

                def valid_rope_diameter?(diameter_mm)
          
      429. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    429. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Rope diameter range prevents finger entrapment while ensuring adequate grip and structural strength

                end
          
      434.

      435.

                def requires_permanent_roof?(user_height)
          
      436.

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Permanent roof mandatory for user heights above enhanced walls threshold to prevent users from being thrown clear
          
      437. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    437. 
            

            

                  user_height.present? && user_height > SLIDE_HEIGHT_THRESHOLDS[:enhanced_walls]
          
      438. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    438. 
            

            

                end
          
      439.

      440. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    440. 
            

            

                def requires_multiple_exits?(user_count)
          
      441. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    441. 
            

            

                  # EN 14960:2019 - Multiple exits required above threshold to ensure adequate emergency evacuation capacity and prevent overcrowding
          
      442. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    442. 
            

            

                  threshold = EQUIPMENT_SAFETY_LIMITS[:multi_exit_threshold]
          
      443. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    443. 
            

            

                  user_count.present? && user_count > threshold
          
      444. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    444. 
            

            

                end
          
      445. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    445. 
            

            

            
          
      446. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    446. 
            

            

                private
          
      447. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    447. 
            

            

            
          
      448. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    448. 
            

            

                def extract_method_lines(lines, start_line, method_name)
          
      449. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    449. 
            

            

                  method_lines = []
          
      450. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    450. 
            

            

                  current_line = start_line
          
      451. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    451. 
            

            

                  indent_level = nil
          
      452. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    452. 
            

            

            
          
      453. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    453. 
            

            

                  # Find the method definition line
          
      454. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    454. 
            

            

                  while current_line < lines.length
          
      455. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    455. 
            

            

                    line = lines[current_line]
          
      456. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    456. 
            

            

                    if line.strip.start_with?("def #{method_name}")
          
      457. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    457. 
            

            

                      indent_level = line.index("def")
          
      458. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    458. 
            

            

                      method_lines << "#{current_line + 1}: #{line}"
          
      459. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    459. 
            

            

                      current_line += 1
          
      460. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    460. 
            

            

                      break
          
      461. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    461. 
            

            

                    end
          
      462. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    462. 
            

            

                    current_line += 1
          
      463. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    463. 
            

            

                  end
          
      464. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    464. 
            

            

            
          
      465. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    465. 
            

            

                  return ["Method definition not found"] if indent_level.nil?
          
      466. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    466. 
            

            

            
          
      467. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    467. 
            

            

                  # Extract method body until we reach the same or lesser indentation with 'end'
          
      468. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    468. 
            

            

                  while current_line < lines.length
          
      469. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    469. 
            

            

                    line = lines[current_line]
          
      470. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    470. 
            

            

                    method_lines << "#{current_line + 1}: #{line}"
          
      471. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    471. 
            

            

            
          
      472. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    472. 
            

            

                    # Check if we've reached the end of the method
          
      473. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    473. 
            

            

                    if line.strip == "end" && (line.index(/\S/) || 0) <= indent_level
          
      474. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    474. 
            

            

                      break
          
      475. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    475. 
            

            

                    end
          
      476. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    476. 
            

            

            
          
      477. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    477. 
            

            

                    current_line += 1
          
      478. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    478. 
            

            

                  end
          
      479. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    479. 
            

            

            
          
      480. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    480. 
            

            

                  method_lines
          
      481. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    481. 
            

            

                end
          
      482. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    482. 
            

            

              end
          
      483. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    483. 
            

            

            end
          
      484.

    app/models/slide_assessment.rb

    47.06% lines covered

    34 relevant lines. 16 lines covered and 18 lines missed. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    1. 
            

            

            # RPII Utility - Slide Assessment model
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

            class SlideAssessment < ApplicationRecord
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :inspection
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Slide measurements
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :slide_platform_height, :slide_wall_height, :runout_value,
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            

            

                :slide_first_metre_height, :slide_beyond_first_metre_height,
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            

            

                numericality: {greater_than_or_equal_to: 0}, allow_blank: true
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # Pass/fail assessments
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            

              validates :clamber_netting_pass, :runout_pass, :slip_sheet_pass,
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                inclusion: {in: [true, false]}, allow_nil: true
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

            
          
      14. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    14. 
            

            

              # Callbacks

              after_update :log_assessment_update, if: :saved_changes?

    16. 
            

            

            
          
      17. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    17. 
            
              1
            

            

              def complete?
          
      18. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    18. 
            

            

                slide_measurements_present? && safety_assessments_complete?
          
      19. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    19.

      20. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    20. 
            

            

            
          
      21. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    21. 
            
              1
            

            

              def meets_runout_requirements?
          
      22. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    22. 
            

            

                return false unless runout_value.present? && slide_platform_height.present?
          
      23. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    23. 
            

            

            
          
      24.

                SafetyStandard.meets_runout_requirements?(runout_value, slide_platform_height)

      26. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    26.

              def safety_check_count
          
      28. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    28. 
            

            

                3 # clamber_netting, runout, slip_sheet
          
      29.

              end
          
      30. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    30. 
            

            

            
          
      31. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    31. 
            
              1
            

            

              def passed_checks_count
          
      32. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    32. 
            

            

                [clamber_netting_pass, runout_pass, slip_sheet_pass].count(true)
          
      33. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    33. 
            

            

              end
          
      34. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    34. 
            

            

            
          
      35. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    35. 
            
              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

                total_fields = 10 # Total assessable fields
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

                completed_fields = [
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            

            

                  slide_platform_height, slide_wall_height, runout_value,
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                  slide_first_metre_height, slide_beyond_first_metre_height,
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                  slide_platform_height_comment
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                ].count(&:present?) + [
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                  clamber_netting_pass, runout_pass, slip_sheet_pass,
          
      43. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    43. 
            

            

                  slide_permanent_roof
          
      44. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    44. 
            

            

                ].count { |field| !field.nil? }
          
      45. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    45. 
            

            

            
          
      46. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    46. 
            

            

                (completed_fields.to_f / total_fields * 100).round(0)
          
      47. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    47. 
            

            

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              1
            

            

              def required_runout_length
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                return nil unless slide_platform_height.present?
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                SafetyStandard.calculate_required_runout(slide_platform_height)
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

              end
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            
              1
            

            

              def runout_compliance_status
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                return "Not Assessed" unless runout_value.present?
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

                if meets_runout_requirements?
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                  "Compliant"
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

                else
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

                  "Non-Compliant (Requires #{required_runout_length}m minimum)"
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            

            

                end
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

              end
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            
              1
            

            

              private
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            

              def slide_measurements_present?
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                slide_platform_height.present? && runout_value.present? && slide_wall_height.present?
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

              end
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            
              1
            

            

              def safety_assessments_complete?
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

                [clamber_netting_pass, runout_pass, slip_sheet_pass].none?(&:nil?)
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

              end
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

            
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_assessment_update
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                inspection.log_audit_action("assessment_updated", inspection.user, "Slide Assessment updated")

    76. 
            

            

              end
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

            end

              1
            

            

              belongs_to :inspection
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            

            

            
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            

            

              # Critical safety checks
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            
              1
            

            

              CRITICAL_CHECKS = %w[seam_integrity_pass lock_stitch_pass air_loss_pass

    7. 
            

            

                straight_walls_pass sharp_edges_pass unit_stable_pass].freeze

      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

                trough_pass entrapment_pass markings_pass grounding_pass].freeze
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13.

              # Required measurements

              # Pass/fail checks for measurements

    19. 
            

            

            
          
      20.

              CRITICAL_CHECKS.each do |check|

              def passed_checks_count

    51. 
            

            

                critical_passes = CRITICAL_CHECKS.count { |check| send(check) == true }

    52. 
            

            

                additional_passes = ADDITIONAL_CHECKS.count { |check| send(check) == true }

    53. 
            

            

            
          
      54.

    55.

    56. 
            

            

            
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            
              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                all_assessable_fields = CRITICAL_CHECKS + REQUIRED_MEASUREMENTS + MEASUREMENT_CHECKS

    59. 
            

            

                total_fields = all_assessable_fields.length
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61.

    62.

    63. 
            

            

                (completed_fields.to_f / total_fields * 100).round(0)
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

              end
          
      65. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    65. 
            

            

            
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            
              1
            

            

              def critical_failure_summary
          
      67. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    67. 
            

            

                failures = CRITICAL_CHECKS.select { |check| send(check) == false }
          
      68. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    68. 
            

            

                return "No critical failures" if failures.empty?
          
      69. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    69. 
            

            

            
          
      70. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    70. 
            

            

                "Critical failures: #{failures.map(&:humanize).join(", ")}"
          
      71. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    71. 
            

            

              end
          
      72. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    72. 
            

            

            
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            
              1
            

            

              def measurement_compliance
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

                {
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

                  stitch_length: stitch_length_compliant?,
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            

            

                  unit_pressure: unit_pressure_compliant?,

              end

                key_additional_checks.none? { |check| send(check).nil? }

              def stitch_length_compliant?

              def blower_tube_distance_compliant?

                blower_tube_length.present? && blower_tube_length >= 1.2 # 1.2m minimum
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107.

    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109.

              def fall_off_height_compliant?

            # RPII Utility - Unit model for bounce house inspection system
          
      2. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    2. 
            
              1
            

            

            class Unit < ApplicationRecord
          
      3. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    3. 
            
              1
            

            

              self.table_name = "units"
          
      4. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    4. 
            
              1
            

            

              include CustomIdGenerator
          
      5. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    5. 
            
              1
            

            

              include HasDimensions
          
      6. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    6. 
            

            

            
          
      7. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    7. 
            
              1
            

            

              belongs_to :user
          
      8. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    8. 
            
              1
            

            

              has_many :inspections, dependent: :destroy
          
      9. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    9. 
            

            

            
          
      10. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    10. 
            

            

              # File attachments
          
      11. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    11. 
            
              1
            

            

              has_one_attached :photo
          
      12. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    12. 
            

            

            
          
      13. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    13. 
            

            

              # All fields are required for Units

      35.

                5 # Number of height-related safety checks
          
      36. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    36. 
            

            

              end
          
      37. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    37. 
            

            

            
          
      38. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    38. 
            
              1
            

            

              def passed_checks_count
          
      39. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    39. 
            

            

                checks = []
          
      40. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    40. 
            

            

                checks << meets_height_requirements?
          
      41. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    41. 
            

            

                checks << permanent_roof_compliant?
          
      42. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    42. 
            

            

                checks << user_capacity_appropriate?

                checks << play_area_adequate?

                checks.count(true)
          
      47.

              end
          
      48. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    48. 
            

            

            
          
      49. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    49. 
            
              1
            

            

              def completion_percentage
          
      50. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    50. 
            

            

                total_fields = 12 # Total number of assessable fields
          
      51. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    51. 
            

            

                completed_fields = [
          
      52. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    52. 
            

            

                  containing_wall_height, platform_height, user_height,
          
      53. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    53. 
            

            

                  users_at_1000mm, users_at_1200mm, users_at_1500mm, users_at_1800mm,
          
      54. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    54. 
            

            

                  play_area_length, play_area_width, negative_adjustment,
          
      55. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    55. 
            

            

                  user_height_comment
          
      56. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    56. 
            

            

                ].count(&:present?) + (permanent_roof.nil? ? 0 : 1)
          
      57. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    57. 
            

            

            
          
      58. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    58. 
            

            

                (completed_fields.to_f / total_fields * 100).round(0)
          
      59. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    59. 
            

            

              end
          
      60. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    60. 
            

            

            
          
      61. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    61. 
            
              1
            

            

              def recommended_user_capacity
          
      62. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    62. 
            

            

                return {} unless play_area_length.present? && play_area_width.present?
          
      63. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    63. 
            

            

            
          
      64. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    64. 
            

            

                SafetyStandard.calculate_user_capacity(play_area_length, play_area_width, negative_adjustment)
          
      65.

              end
          
      66. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    66. 
            

            

            
          
      67.

              # Alias for view compatibility

              alias_method :calculated_capacities, :recommended_user_capacity

      70.

              1
            

            

              private

              def required_fields_present?
          
      73. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    73. 
            

            

                containing_wall_height.present? && platform_height.present? && user_height.present?
          
      74. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    74. 
            

            

              end
          
      75. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    75. 
            

            

            
          
      76. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    76. 
            
              1
            

            

              def height_measurements_valid?
          
      77. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    77. 
            

            

                return true unless containing_wall_height.present? && platform_height.present?
          
      78. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    78. 
            

            

                containing_wall_height >= platform_height
          
      79. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    79. 
            

            

              end
          
      80. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    80. 
            

            

            
          
      81. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    81. 
            
              1
            

            

              def permanent_roof_compliant?
          
      82. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    82. 
            

            

                # Business logic for permanent roof requirements based on height
          
      83. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    83. 
            

            

                return true unless user_height.present?
          
      84. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    84. 
            

            

            
          
      85. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    85. 
            

            

                if user_height > 6.0
          
      86. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    86. 
            

            

                  permanent_roof == true
          
      87. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    87. 
            

            

                else
          
      88. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    88. 
            

            

                  true # Not required for lower heights
          
      89. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    89. 
            

            

                end
          
      90. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    90. 
            

            

              end
          
      91. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    91. 
            

            

            
          
      92. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    92. 
            
              1
            

            

              def user_capacity_appropriate?
          
      93. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    93. 
            

            

                total_user_capacity > 0 && total_user_capacity <= maximum_safe_capacity
          
      94. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    94. 
            

            

              end
          
      95. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    95. 
            

            

            
          
      96. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    96. 
            
              1
            

            

              def maximum_safe_capacity
          
      97. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    97. 
            

            

                return 50 unless play_area_length.present? && play_area_width.present?
          
      98. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    98. 
            

            

            
          
      99. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    99. 
            

            

                # Maximum 1 person per 1.5 square meters
          
      100. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    100. 
            

            

                usable_area = (play_area_length * play_area_width) - (negative_adjustment || 0)
          
      101. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    101. 
            

            

                (usable_area / 1.5).floor
          
      102. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    102. 
            

            

              end
          
      103. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    103. 
            

            

            
          
      104. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    104. 
            
              1
            

            

              def play_area_adequate?
          
      105. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    105. 
            

            

                play_area_length.present? && play_area_width.present? &&
          
      106. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    106. 
            

            

                  play_area_length > 0 && play_area_width > 0
          
      107. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    107. 
            

            

              end
          
      108. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    108. 
            

            

            
          
      109. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    109. 
            
              1
            

            

              def negative_adjustments_reasonable?
          
      110. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    110. 
            

            

                return true unless negative_adjustment.present?
          
      111. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    111. 
            

            

                return true unless play_area_length.present? && play_area_width.present?
          
      112. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    112. 
            

            

            
          
      113. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    113. 
            

            

                total_area = play_area_length * play_area_width
          
      114. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    114. 
            

            

                negative_adjustment < (total_area * 0.3) # Should not exceed 30% of total area
          
      115. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    115. 
            

            

              end
          
      116. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    116. 
            

            

            
          
      117. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    117. 
            
              1
            

            

              def log_assessment_update
          
      118. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    118. 
            

            

                inspection.log_audit_action("assessment_updated", inspection.user, "User Height Assessment updated")
          
      119. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    119. 
            

            

              end
          
      120. 
        
      
      
        
      
          
    120. 
            

            

            end
          
      121.

    app/services/comprehensive_pdf_generator_service.rb

    351 relevant lines. 0 lines covered and 351 lines missed.
